translation.en: Hey, stranger.
It's not what it looks like.
It is, but I can explain--
-Ow! [gasps] -[figure whispering] I know…
[woman 1] No.
No! No!
[woman 1] The power to fly. That's what you dream of.
translation.zh: ‎飞翔的力量 ‎那是你梦寐以求的东西

translation.en: There's no better feeling.
The truth is, you only fly for a second or two
translation.zh: ‎事实上 你只会飞上一、两秒

translation.en: before gravity takes back what you tried to steal.
translation.zh: ‎然后重力就会收回你试图偷走的东西

translation.en: Because no matter how hard you work, how strong you are, or how thin you get…
translation.zh:
‎因为不管你多努力
‎意志多坚强 或身材多纤细…

translation.en: gravity always, always wins.
[woman 2] Neveah. Neveah!
Chicago called.
They said they didn't want me.
Something changed their mind.
What happened?
I wish I knew.
Hey.
Good luck in there.
[woman 3] The Archer School of Ballet has bolstered its security protocols,
translation.zh: ‎阿奇芭蕾学院已经加强安保

translation.en: offered counseling to all students,
and put the focus squarely back where it should be,
training the next generation of world-class dancers.
There are reports of angry parents, donors pulling out.
translation.zh:
‎有报道声称愤怒的家长
‎和投资人纷纷撤资

translation.en: One star student sadly suffered a fateful misstep.
translation.zh:
‎一个优等生不幸踩空了一脚
‎犯了致命的错误

translation.en: "Misstep"? She fell four stories…
translation.zh: ‎“踩空”？她可是从四层楼上掉了下去

translation.en: [woman 1] Of course, for any dancer, the higher you fly,
translation.zh: ‎当然了 对任何舞者来说 飞得越高

translation.en: the more bone-shattering the landing that inevitably arrives.
translation.zh: ‎不可避免的摔倒就有多惨痛

translation.en: You have to be quick on your feet to adapt and deal with the unexpected.
translation.zh: ‎你必须迅速站起来 ‎适应并应对突发情况

translation.en: And in time,
you learn two tricks that help you survive when there's trouble in the spotlight.
translation.zh:
‎发生舞台事故时
‎你学会了用两招转危为安

translation.en: First, you never lose your smile.
translation.zh: ‎第一招 永远要面带微笑

translation.en: And second,
you make damn sure you distract them with something else to look at.
translation.zh:
‎一定要确保转移观众的注意力
‎让他们看别的东西

translation.en: [woman 4] Madame DuBois.
Neveah Stroyer.
[gasps] Monique DuBois! Oh, my gosh!
Welcome to the Archer School of Ballet.
Our newest arrival, here on a full-ride scholarship.
translation.zh:
‎这是我们最新录取的学生
‎拿全额奖学金的

translation.en: We helped a girl escape her dead-end life in Compton.
translation.zh:
‎我们帮助一个女孩逃离了
‎她在坎普顿没有前途的人生

translation.en: -[camera shutter clicks] -Inglewood, actually, but--
Oh, well, when we see talent, we don't ask where it comes from.
Dancers here have trained since they could walk.
translation.zh: ‎这里的舞者从会走路开始就接受训练

translation.en: Up for the late arrival?
With a girl of Neveah's talent, two years here will prime her for success.
translation.zh:
‎以娜薇娅的才能
‎她在这里学习两年就能走向成功

translation.en: Dancing in Cassie Shore's footsteps.
Who's Cassie Shore?
We have a tired young lady here. [chuckles]
-Be in touch for a photo release. -[Monique chuckles] Thank you so much.
translation.zh: ‎照片发布的事联系我就好 ‎非常感谢

translation.en: That went over like a lead balloon.
-Was there something I was-- -Yes, but for now, get her to Alan.
translation.zh: ‎我是不是… ‎对 但你现在先带她去找艾伦

translation.en: [Cassie] They start with your bones, then your feet, frame, and flexibility.
translation.zh:
‎他们先检查你的骨骼
‎然后是脚、骨架和柔韧性

translation.en: Your musicality, charisma, and deference.
translation.zh: ‎你的乐感、个人魅力和服从性

translation.en: Then after they've taken you apart…
they wanna see a spark.
It's so we can check your alignment,
translation.zh: ‎这样我才能检查你的身体正列

translation.en: see how your turnout is regressing.
You sure she'll do the trick?
[Monique] It's a start.
I'm also announcing the premiere of a new ballet by Ramon Costa.
translation.zh:
‎我还会宣布一部由罗蒙科斯塔
‎创作的芭蕾新剧首演

translation.en: Ramon Costa? But we don't have him.
translation.zh: ‎罗蒙科斯塔？但他不是我们的人

translation.en: Yet.
Neveah, there's a photo of your dad on file. What about your mother?
translation.zh:
‎娜薇娅 文件里有一张你爸爸的照片
‎你母亲呢？

translation.en: What about her?
We predict how you'll develop from the--
I know, but you already accepted me.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 但你们已经招收我了

translation.en: This Cassie Shore, what went down?
translation.zh: ‎那个叫凯西肖尔的 出什么事了？

translation.en: There was an accident.
So she's gone, and that's why I'm here?
translation.zh: ‎所以我来这里是为了顶替她？

translation.en: You're here, Neveah, because you have something special.
translation.zh: ‎娜薇娅 你在这里是因为你有天赋

translation.en: Now go out there and make sure they see it.
Okay, so you're tier three, ages 16 and 17.
translation.zh: ‎好了 你是第三阶 16岁和17岁

translation.en: Doors lock at curfew, and all guests sign in.
translation.zh: ‎宵禁后会锁门 访客进入需要登记

translation.en: Academics are from eight to noon.
You missed today, but I got your homework.
translation.zh:
‎你已经错过了今天的
‎但我给你拿了作业

translation.en: And then dance is from 1:00 to 6:30.
Lights out at ten.
Honey.
[taps on door] Here's home.
Your roommate's name is June.
You drink or smoke, you're out. You fail your academics, you're gone.
translation.zh: ‎抽烟喝酒都会被开除 ‎文化课不及格也会被开除

translation.en: You get too skinny, you're sent home.
translation.zh: ‎你要是太瘦 会被送回家

translation.en: You get caught screwing a boy, or a girl, for that matter, bye-bye.
translation.zh:
‎要是被逮到跟男孩上床
‎或者女孩也一样 你就得跟这里道别

translation.en: Basically, just act like I'm watching everything, because I am.
translation.zh:
‎总而言之 你就当我一直在盯着你
‎因为我确实在盯着你

translation.en: Toodles.
Thanks.
Did she say one? Oh, shit.
[man] All right, everyone, let's get started.
translation.zh: ‎好了 各位 我们开始吧

translation.en: -Facing the barre in sixth, please. -You're in my spot.
translation.zh: ‎大家以六位站姿面对栏杆 ‎这是我的位置

translation.en: [man] Pressing over to three-quarter pointe plié. Right, left.
translation.zh: ‎压紧身子 四分之三足尖蹲 ‎右边 左边

translation.en: Rolling through the feet.
-And reverse. -Sorry, that's mine.
Rise, test your balance.
Open to first.
-Repeat in second. -And anywhere but there.
translation.zh:
‎-用二位站姿重复
‎-除了这里哪都行

translation.en: And finish with a four-count side bend, right, left.
translation.zh: ‎然后用四拍侧弯曲结尾 右边 左边

translation.en: -And a nice, full rond de corps… -Everyone's got their place.
translation.zh:
‎-然后是漂亮的四向身体划圈…
‎-大家都有自己的位置

translation.en: [man] Yes! Let's have a waltz, please. Thank you, Richard.
translation.zh: ‎对！放华尔兹乐吧 ‎谢谢 理查德

translation.en: And…
-[man] Relax the ankles in the demi. -You're in the sticks, darling.
translation.zh: ‎半蹲的时候放松脚踝 ‎亲爱的 你占那边人的地盘了

translation.en: [man] Keep the heels together as you roll through.
translation.zh: ‎踮脚的时候脚后跟不要分开

translation.en: And demi.
And double.
And lengthen into the grand…
Present the heel in the tendu devant, people!
translation.zh: ‎大家向前擦地时亮出脚后跟！

translation.en: Humor me, please! People, close the ribs!
translation.zh: ‎满足一下我吧！各位 收肋骨！

translation.en: I need to see the fifth.
Make your transitions precise.
Your weight over your supporting leg does not mean slouching.
translation.zh:
‎把重心放在支撑腿上
‎不是让你们懒懒散散的

translation.en: -We don't wear junk here. -Junk?
Junk. You've covered what I need to see.
translation.zh: ‎破烂 你盖住了我需要看到的部位

translation.en: Lift in the attitude.
You're sinking in your port de bras. Sternum up.
translation.zh:
‎你做手臂动作的时候 臀部一高一低
‎抬起胸骨

translation.en: Drop that hip.
Nope, your hip's still up to your ear.
translation.zh: ‎不行 你的臀部还是太高

translation.en: Your weight's in your heels.
You need to be over your supporting leg.
Drop your hip.
Lift.
Bette, demonstrate to the side.
-[piano music fades] -Look. Do you see?
Okay, I'll spare you.
Just visiting?
New admission.
Then show up next class in proper attire with better shoes.
translation.zh:
‎那下次来上课时合理着装
‎穿双好点的鞋

translation.en: Those are a fiasco.
Bette, your second arm is late.
translation.zh: ‎贝特 你第二只胳膊晚了

translation.en: Your second arm is late.
No. Try a higher passé.
translation.zh: ‎不行 试一下高点的大吸腿

translation.en: -[piano music fades] -Another year, and still not a turner.
translation.zh: ‎又练了一年 你还是转不好身

translation.en: Your summer break did you no favors.
So, tomorrow after class, we'll begin pas de deux.
translation.zh:
‎所以 明天下课后
‎我们就开始双人舞

translation.en: But this term, each of you will be assigned just one partner.
translation.zh:
‎但这学期
‎你们每人都只会被分配一个搭档

translation.en: Trust in this building has been broken,
translation.zh: ‎这栋楼里的信任已经被打破了

translation.en: and this may help rebuild it.
translation.zh: ‎或许这样能帮助我们重建信任

translation.en: [quietly] Wow. He's amazing!
Yeah, if you're hot for psychos.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 如果你对神经病情有独钟的话

translation.en: You ask me, he pushed her.
translation.zh: ‎要我说 是他把她推了下去

translation.en: Nabil, very good.
Pushed who?
His girlfriend, Cassie.
Pinch whatever you need to and get busy.
translation.zh: ‎随便选一双 好好练功吧

translation.en: This is every shoe that ballerinas at City Works rejected,
translation.zh:
‎被城市工厂芭蕾舞团的芭蕾舞演员
‎拒绝的舞鞋都在这里

translation.en: yours for a few bucks.
You did pretty good today.
[scoffs] Are you kidding? I could not get on my leg.
translation.zh: ‎你在开玩笑吗？我连鹤立都做不好

translation.en: We've all been there.
You think this place can make me company-ready in two years?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得我在这里学习两年后
‎能进入芭蕾舞公司吗？

translation.en: I've seen them do more with less.
But if they're wrong, you're gone.
translation.zh: ‎但他们要是错了 你就完了

translation.en: I'm sorry, we haven't met.
Bette. This is June.
Show me your arches.
-What, my feet? -[June] That won't make a dancer.
translation.zh: ‎什么 我的脚吗？ ‎脚能显示舞者的功力

translation.en: Where'd you train?
Bette's just scoping the competish.
Scared.
Anyone who got in this late must be fierce prima material.
translation.zh:
‎这么晚被录取的人
‎肯定是竞争女一的有利人选

translation.en: All right, pretty good. [sighs]
Friends. [chuckles]
Neveah, these would be perfect for you.
translation.zh: ‎娜薇娅 这双鞋最适合你

translation.en: Double X, high vamp?
What is…
Are these Delia Whitlaw's shoes?
translation.zh: ‎这是迪莉娅惠特劳尔的鞋吗？

translation.en: Well, her rejects.
[boy] They look like a perfect fit.
-Isn't that interesting, Bette? -You're trash, Shane.
translation.zh: ‎是不是很有意思 贝特？ ‎你这人真垃圾 肖恩

translation.en: Have fun scavenging with your new petit rat.
translation.zh: ‎祝你和你的新小老鼠觅食愉快

translation.en: June.
[June] Bye.
-Did she just call me a-- -[Shane] A rat, yep.
translation.zh:
‎-她刚是不是叫我…
‎-老鼠 对

translation.en: But like everything in ballet, it sounds better in French.
translation.zh:
‎但在芭蕾里
‎所有词用法语说出来都比较好听

translation.en: A little rat's a dancer who's young, pretty, poor, and hella strong.
translation.zh:
‎小老鼠指的是一位年轻漂亮
‎出身贫穷 ‎但又异常坚强的舞者

translation.en: And this one here wears the shoes of Delia fricking Whitlaw.
translation.zh:
‎坐在这里的这位舞者
‎穿的可是迪莉娅惠特劳尔的鞋

translation.en: It's crazy.
I only applied to the Archer because it's where she went.
translation.zh:
‎我申请阿奇学院
‎只是因为她在这里学习过

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
Then let's get you a front-row seat.
translation.zh: ‎那到时候给你弄张前排的票

translation.en: -[grunts] -Easy, man.
-Hey. -[grunts] What the fuck!
You're good.
I'm not good. I had another one in me.
translation.zh: ‎我没练够呢 我还能再做一个呢

translation.en: Blowing out a pec ain't gonna help with your dancing.
translation.zh: ‎练出胸肌也无益于提升你的功力

translation.en: You heard Brooks. I'm out of shape.
translation.zh: ‎你听到布鲁克斯的话了 ‎我身材走样了

translation.en: [grunts] Guaranteed he wasn't talking about you.
[boy] Caleb, check it out. Second time that cop's talked to him.
translation.zh: ‎凯勒布 你看 ‎这是那警察第二次找他问话了

translation.en: She must smell blood.
You tell her anything?
[exhales] Oren, we all stuck to the same story.
translation.zh: ‎奥伦 我们必须口径一致

translation.en: Cassie was alone. We weren't there.
translation.zh: ‎当时只有凯西一个人 我们不在那里

translation.en: You sure impressed Brooks today.
translation.zh: ‎你今天真是惊艳到了布鲁克斯

translation.en: Not really.
A little rusty.
Must suck, coming all this way to be with your girlfriend…
translation.zh: ‎你肯定很糟心吧 ‎为了跟女朋友在一起 大老远跑过来…

translation.en: and then she goes and falls off the fucking building.
I came here to study dance.
Chicago made an offer I cannot refuse.
translation.zh: ‎芝加哥开出了我无法拒绝的条件

translation.en: [Oren] I was watching you.
I know.
You don't have the American style.
That's true.
I'm more than tits and teeth.
I watched you too.
You're banal, safe.
Safe till you showed up.
translation.zh: ‎你出现之前这里倒是很安稳

translation.en: And then… [whistles]
Splat.
And now the cops.
I tell her how Cassie told me how you would drop her.
translation.zh:
‎凯西跟我说过你会推她下去
‎我把这事告诉警察了

translation.en: Perhaps sabotage--
[Oren] I was the best partner she ever had!
-[Nabil] Gotta show me respect. -Hey, guys, break it up!
You don't belong here.
-Oh, my God. -I have goose bumps, look.
translation.zh:
‎-老天
‎-我都起鸡皮疙瘩了 你看

translation.en: Delia Whitlaw.
Do you know, I've seen, like, a hundred videos of her?
translation.zh:
‎你知道我差不多
‎看过她100个视频吗？

translation.en: City Works is lucky to get her back.
translation.zh: ‎城市工厂能把她请回来 真是运气好

translation.en: After rocking it in Europe last year, she could write her own ticket.
translation.zh:
‎她去年在欧洲红到发紫
‎可以想怎样就怎样的

translation.en: [man] Don't be dragged by the tempi. Anticipate.
translation.zh: ‎别被重心动作拖累 要做预测

translation.en: Oh, she's a goddess.
[man] All right. Let this section travel more.
translation.zh: ‎好 ‎继续这部分的舞步 再走一点

translation.en: [Shane sighs] So good.
Footwork needs refining.
[Delia] I'm giving it all I've got, Ramon.
There's no room for me in the choreography.
[Ramon] You're dancing from here.
But I need to see it here.
And when the night comes…
here.
The piece is in you.
I'm only drawing it out. Come on.
Touch an audience the same way that you would touch me.
translation.zh: ‎用你触摸我的方式去触动观众

translation.en: Come on, girl, tear off his shirt.
translation.zh: ‎快啊 妞儿 把他的T恤扯掉

translation.en: [Delia] Like this?
If it's something you can use.
Let's go.
[Shane] Well, that's no fun.
[Cassie] Always, something hurts.
Somewhere on your body, there's pain,
an ache that comes from pushing beyond what any person was ever meant to do.
translation.zh: ‎因为突破人体极限 会产生疼痛

translation.en: But there's strength in being part of a larger body.
translation.zh: ‎但属于一个更大的集体带给你力量

translation.en: [girl laughs] Please.
[Cassie] The corps de ballet.
-[giggling] -[June] Well, she's certainly got style.
[Bette] Yeah, for a pole dancer.
-That there isn't even ballet. -[hip-hop music playing]
Guys.
Found your little dance show.
Very cute.
At least somebody here actually likes to dance.
translation.zh: ‎至少这里真正有人喜欢跳舞

translation.en: That what this is for you?
Playtime?
You just told me I was good enough to be your friend.
translation.zh:
‎你刚还跟我说我足够好
‎可以成为你的朋友

translation.en: It wasn't because you were good, Petit Rat.
translation.zh: ‎那不是因为你足够好 小老鼠

translation.en: It's because I was better.
I get that I'm late to the party,
and I get that I might ruin your little plan
to be the next queen bee around here,
translation.zh: ‎你成为这里下一任蜂后的小算盘

translation.en: but I got up in here fair and square, and you best believe
translation.zh: ‎但我是凭真本事进来的 你最好相信

translation.en: I'm coming for you.
Miss Stroyer, Madame DuBois wants to see you.
translation.zh: ‎斯托耶小姐？杜波瓦女士想见你

translation.en: Now.
Relax, officer. It's cortisone.
translation.zh: ‎放松 警官 这就是可的松

translation.en: If I could just speak to a few more students--
translation.zh: ‎如果我能再跟几个学生聊聊…

translation.en: I spoke to your sergeant. The case is closed.
translation.zh: ‎我跟你的警长谈过了 已经结案了

translation.en: Yet a beat cop is here exploiting an awful accident,
translation.zh:
‎但一个巡逻警察却来这里
‎揪着一起惨痛的事故不放

translation.en: traumatizing my students, for what?
translation.zh: ‎给我的学生带来创伤 为什么？

translation.en: You can't tell me you're satisfied.
translation.zh: ‎你不能告诉我你对这结果满意

translation.en: [Monique] You can't tell me you're getting anywhere.
translation.zh: ‎你也不能告诉我你取得了进展

translation.en: You've had a week to find one iota of foul play,
translation.zh:
‎你已经花了一周
‎去寻找谋杀案的蛛丝马迹

translation.en: but it all adds up to a tragic fall.
translation.zh: ‎但一切都指向悲剧性的跌落

translation.en: Piercing this takes time. Every institution has its secrets.
translation.zh: ‎抽丝剥茧需要时间 ‎每个机构都有不可告人的秘密

translation.en: Before the police, you were in the army?
God knows what you did there, officer, but ballet is no place for redemption.
translation.zh: ‎天知道你在部队里做过什么 警官 ‎但芭蕾不是赎罪的地方

translation.en: I found her.
We were just wrapping up.
Settling in, I hope.
Dégagez, officer.
You wanted to see me?
[Monique] You're to attend tonight's donor reception.
translation.zh: ‎你要参加今晚的捐赠者招待会

translation.en: A driver will fetch you with the others,
and Selena can help you find something presentable in the costume department.
translation.zh:
‎赛琳娜可以去服装部
‎帮你找一身拿得出手的衣服

translation.en: -I have my own clothes. -Of course you do.
But ballet demands a certain--
-Merde! -Oh! Apologies, Madame.
That was bone you hit.
We are about to invest thousands of dollars in you,
translation.zh: ‎我们就要在你身上投几千美元

translation.en: and we need to know that in two years' time,
you will be a product…
-Product? -…that we can make use of.
You're either the ASB's future or a bad gamble.
translation.zh:
‎你要么是阿奇芭蕾学院的未来
‎要么是我们押错了宝

translation.en: Our key donors will be asking themselves that very question tonight.
translation.zh:
‎我们的主要捐赠人
‎今晚会问自己这个问题

translation.en: On these cards is the story you'll want to tell.
translation.zh: ‎你到时候就按这些卡片上写的说

translation.en: Madame DuBois, I'm just here to dance.
translation.zh: ‎杜波瓦女士 我就是来这里跳舞的

translation.en: Wrong. Tonight decides your future as much as anything you do in class.
translation.zh:
‎你错了 ‎今晚会像你在课堂上的表现一样
‎决定你的未来

translation.en: [Cassie] There's a price you pay learning to fly.
They steal your childhood, your family…
translation.zh: ‎他们会偷走你的童年和家人…

translation.en: -Hey. -…leave you only with friends
who hope every day that your Achilles will snap.
translation.zh: ‎每天都盼着你的跟腱断掉的朋友

translation.en: And they never let you grow up.
[Cassie] So if you wanna live a little…
you gotta get creative.
[sighs] God, I need this.
I was thinking we should get ourselves cast as partners.
-[Bette] Huh? -We'd dominate.
Word is, I'm getting paired with Nabil.
So we fight it.
[scoffs] I don't want to rock the boat.
Aw, jeez.
-[exhales] -You think Frenchie's better than me.
And you don't want to be stuck tossing around the new girl.
translation.zh:
‎你不想天天抱着
‎新来的女孩 把她掷来掷去

translation.en: We can all fake a lot of things onstage.
translation.zh: ‎我们在舞台上可以假装很多东西

translation.en: -But we can't fake love. -Oh, yeah. I can.
-No candles. -[taps on door]
-[panting] Someone's coming. -[grunts]
Oh, well, I guess it's not gonna be me.
Oh, I just gotta work out this cramp. Brooks had us do push-ups after barre.
translation.zh:
‎我抽筋了 在这里缓缓 ‎布鲁克斯让我们上完横杆课后
‎做了好多俯卧撑

translation.en: Honey, I don't care if you broke a bone. If Bette's in there, the door is open.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 你就是骨折了我也不在乎
‎如果贝特在里面 就得开门

translation.en: Except they're busy.
Fighting.
I don't hear it.
The silent treatment phase. Brutal.
translation.zh: ‎他们在冷战阶段 可残忍了

translation.en: Yeah. Do you want to see brutal?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那你想看看什么才是残忍吗？

translation.en: -No. -No.
Oh, hey, Torri.
You know the rules.
Did the door blow shut? I hadn't noticed. Oren, did you notice?
translation.zh:
‎是不是风把门吹上了？我没注意到
‎奥伦 你有注意到吗？

translation.en: -Was deep into the causes of the Cold War. -[Torri] Mm-hmm.
Actually, Torri, I'm glad you came by. You know I'm attending that event later?
translation.zh:
‎其实 托里 ‎很高兴你来了
‎你知道我随后要参加那个活动吧？

translation.en: I have this lovely, bejeweled cocktail mini,
translation.zh:
‎我有一件可爱的嵌了宝石的
‎鸡尾酒会迷你礼服

translation.en: but the tulle's a little fuzzy, so I'll need use of an iron.
translation.zh:
‎但薄纱有点皱了
‎所以我需要一个熨斗

translation.en: -[exhales] -I'm done playing this game.
Hey, I owe you one.
Why didn't I just borrow one of theirs?
translation.zh: ‎我怎么不管他们借一身衣服呢？

translation.en: That looks nice.
I'm so not ready for this.
Okay, let me have a look at what I have.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我看看我这里有什么

translation.en: Yeah.
You just need a little extra zhuzh.
translation.zh: ‎你只需要一个提气的小装饰

translation.en: Or… like that.
That looks chic. And the other girls, they're just jealous.
translation.zh: ‎看起来很时髦 ‎其他女孩 她们就是嫉妒你

translation.en: Of what?
You saw how the ballet master was going at me.
translation.zh: ‎你也看到芭蕾老师批评我了

translation.en: Wrong this, wrong that.
At least he was paying you attention.
He never gives me a single correction.
-Maybe you're already good enough. -It's ballet. Nobody's good enough.
translation.zh: ‎或许是因为你已经足够好了 ‎这可是芭蕾 谁都不会足够好

translation.en: [Cassie] There's a twisted bargain to ballet.
translation.zh: ‎芭蕾里存在一个扭曲的交易

translation.en: After all your hard work, your pain and sacrifice,
translation.zh: ‎在你付出那么多努力、疼痛和牺牲后

translation.en: when you walk among mortals,
you become a god.
You're a perfect, worshipped fruition of the best the body can do.
translation.zh:
‎你是身体所能塑造的最完美
‎且受到崇拜的成果

translation.en: [photographer] Fantastic. Thank you. Can we get a quick candid with you?
translation.zh:
‎好极了 女士们 谢了
‎能迅速给你们四个拍张照吗？

translation.en: Yeah, together. All right, big smiles, now.
translation.zh: ‎好 大家站近点 可以 笑得灿烂点

translation.en: Love it. Fantastic suit.
translation.zh: ‎我真爱这张照片 西服不错

translation.en: -♪ Or are you man enough to be? ♪ -♪ Are you man enough to be? ♪
translation.zh:
‎（未知号码：你尽管不理我
‎这世界还是知道你做了什么）

translation.en: -♪ Or are you man enough for me? ♪ -♪ Are you man enough for me? ♪
-♪ Or are you man enough to be? ♪ -♪ Are you man enough to be? ♪
And after this past week, I have to admit
translation.zh: ‎经过过去这周的事 我必须承认

translation.en: that it turns out not all press is good press.
[Monique] But thanks to you here, this school is stronger than ever.
translation.zh:
‎但多亏了在场的各位
‎学院比以往任何时候都要坚强

translation.en: Inspired by your faith and generosity,
translation.zh: ‎被你们的信念和慷慨所鼓舞

translation.en: the school will be creating a new ballet
in Cassie's honor,
by renowned choreographer Ramon Costa.
translation.zh:
‎由大名鼎鼎的编舞师
‎罗蒙科斯塔亲自操刀

translation.en: -[crowd gasps] -You gotta be kidding me.
The ballet world will soon have its eye on the school for the right reasons.
translation.zh: ‎芭蕾界很快会以恰当的缘由关注本校

translation.en: To a bright future.
[man] Yeah, cheers! Bright future!
This had better work.
Yes, and we appreciate the support from enthusiasts like you.
translation.zh:
‎对 而且我们很感激
‎像你这样的积极分子的支持

translation.en: I'm worth a lot more than a fat check.
Leave the Archer to its director.
translation.zh: ‎就让理事操心阿奇学院的事吧

translation.en: Let's just hope the crisis isn't beyond you.
translation.zh: ‎我们还是期盼你有能力处理好危机吧

translation.en: Hello again.
Hey there.
So I hear they call you the wrench?
With a name like Alan, it kind of fits.
How was your first day?
They kind of threw me in the deep end.
translation.zh: ‎他们直接把我扔到了水深火热里

translation.en: You've got a decent arch and open hips, and around here, that'll get you far.
translation.zh:
‎你有不错的足弓和开放式臀部
‎在这里 它们能让你大有作为

translation.en: Tell it to that sadistic jackass.
translation.zh: ‎把这话说给那个虐待狂混蛋吧

translation.en: The way he rolls? You have no idea.
translation.zh: ‎他的行事作风 你都不知道

translation.en: Oh, I do. Topher Brooks is my husband.
translation.zh: ‎我当然知道 ‎特菲尔布鲁克斯是我丈夫

translation.en: Well…
better mingle. [exhales]
I'm not doing it, Monique.
Once I set this new piece at City Works, I'm back to Paris.
translation.zh:
‎等我编好城市工厂的这部新剧后
‎我就回巴黎

translation.en: To choreograph another art wank?
translation.zh: ‎再去编一部自我放纵的烂剧？

translation.en: Ramon, I'm offering you a safe place to work out big ideas,
translation.zh:
‎罗蒙 我在向你提供一个
‎实现伟大构想的安全之地

translation.en: get a jump on talent.
He's got all the talent he needs.
[Monique] It would show loyalty to the school,
translation.zh: ‎这会显示出你对学院的忠诚

translation.en: which means loyalty to the professional company
translation.zh: ‎也就意味着你对我们输送舞者的

translation.en: we build dancers for.
City Works Ballet will commission a full-length work next year.
translation.zh:
‎城市工厂芭蕾舞团下一年
‎会跟我们合作一部持续全年的作品

translation.en: If you work with us, I'll push for you to get that gig.
translation.zh:
‎如果你跟我们合作
‎我会努力促成你得到这个机会

translation.en: I know you're desperate to tell a new story, Monique…
translation.zh:
‎我知道你迫切
‎想讲一个新故事 莫妮卡…

translation.en: but I'm long past being your boy toy.
Darling, there's cheese on that.
Trust me, Mother, I earned it today.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 母亲 这是我今天应得的

translation.en: I'm glad to hear. Oren, what a delight.
translation.zh: ‎那就好 奥伦 见到你真高兴

translation.en: -Mrs. Whitlaw. Thanks for having us. -[kisses]
translation.zh: ‎惠特劳尔夫人 ‎谢谢你邀请我们

translation.en: I swear we host these jamborees just to clap eyes on our girls.
translation.zh:
‎我发誓 我们举办这种热闹的聚会
‎就是为了看看我们的两个女儿

translation.en: I hope we'll all be seeing lots of you two this season, onstage and off.
translation.zh:
‎希望在这一季能经常看到你们俩
‎不管是在台上还是台下

translation.en: I hope so too.
Topher.
Tell us.
Is this a star pairing or what?
Partners have already been finalized.
I'm sure you'll do the right thing.
I always do, Katrina.
Mom, you can't boss around my ballet master!
translation.zh:
‎妈妈 你不能
‎对我的芭蕾老师发号施令！

translation.en: I wouldn't dream of it.
Now, let's get you in front of Ramon Costa.
translation.zh: ‎我现在带你去见一下罗蒙科斯塔

translation.en: Where's that shawl that goes with that dress?
translation.zh: ‎跟这条裙子一起的披肩哪去了？

translation.en: I didn't need it tonight.
Those bony shoulders are turning heads. You're not eating enough.
translation.zh: ‎你那瘦骨嶙峋的肩膀招惹了太多目光 ‎你没吃多少

translation.en: I'm fine, Mom, and I'm glad to see you.
translation.zh: ‎我饱了 妈妈 而且我很高兴见到你

translation.en: Well, I had a flight back to New York tonight.
But some things are more important.
Exactly.
What happened to Cassie reminds us all, life's short.
translation.zh:
‎凯西的遭遇提醒我们所有人
‎人生苦短

translation.en: What's your role?
My role?
Your part in the ballet showcase.
translation.zh: ‎你在芭蕾展示作品里的角色

translation.en: Oh. Well, with the accident, they've delayed any casting announcements.
translation.zh:
‎出事之后
‎他们推迟了所有的选角公告

translation.en: Bloody artists, can't keep their schedule.
translation.zh: ‎可恶的艺术家 总是不守时

translation.en: It's The Sleeping Beauty this year, which is perfect for me.
translation.zh: ‎今年是《睡美人》 简直太适合我了

translation.en: Everybody says I'm guaranteed to dance Aurora now.
translation.zh:
‎现在所有人都说
‎我一定会出演奥罗拉公主

translation.en: -Why can't you believe in me? -[mother] I do.
translation.zh:
‎-你为什么就不能相信我呢？
‎-我相信你

translation.en: I'm just not paying through the teeth
so you can get a rubbish education and no future.
translation.zh:
‎不是为了让你接受不入流的教育
‎连个未来都没有

translation.en: I get it. You want a doctor, a lawyer, a senator.
translation.zh:
‎我明白 你希望我成为
‎医生、律师或参议员

translation.en: Mom, I just want to dance.
So dance… in your bedroom, in the shower.
translation.zh:
‎那就跳啊…在你的卧室里
‎或淋浴的时候

translation.en: Go prance at your prom like every other teenage girl.
translation.zh:
‎就像其他少女一样在你的毕业舞会上
‎欢腾地跳来跳去

translation.en: But I did not raise my only child to prop up the scenery.
translation.zh:
‎但我不是要把唯一的女儿
‎培养成陪衬的

translation.en: You're either on track to make principal dancer or you're out.
translation.zh:
‎你要么志在必得 成为主演
‎要么你就别跳舞了

translation.en: Mom!
I'm on track.
Look, I'll get a lead role, and every artistic director will want me
translation.zh: ‎听着 我会拿到主演的角色 ‎每个艺术总监都会抢着找我

translation.en: because Cassie won't be stealing my spotlight.
translation.zh: ‎因为凯西不会偷走我的风头了

translation.en: She didn't steal it, June. She's better than you.
translation.zh: ‎她没有偷 朱恩 她确实比你强

translation.en: She's not better than me now.
Now, that's my girl.
What do you think is one of the factors that gave you the cutting edge
translation.zh: ‎你觉得是什么因素给了你优势

translation.en: to get you where you are today?
I think it was the gymnastics that helped me advance so quickly
translation.zh: ‎我觉得是体操让我进步很快

translation.en: when I started ballet.
And the hip-hop stuff I do, it's kind of--
I saw some videos online.
translation.zh:
‎我在网上看到了一些视频
‎你的舞蹈里…

translation.en: There's a wonderful power to them.
-[camera shutters click] -It's just me messing around.
The girls here diss them big time.
translation.zh: ‎这里的女孩子都使劲吐槽那些舞蹈

translation.en: I mean, I've seen some rough stuff back home,
translation.zh: ‎我在老家见识过一些糟心事

translation.en: but nothing compared to this shit.
translation.zh: ‎但跟这里一比 简直是小巫见大巫

translation.en: Yes, what I think Neveah would like to emphasize
translation.zh: ‎对 我认为娜薇娅想强调的是

translation.en: is how the ASB is about the f--
Fundamentals. Yes.
In which I am in great need of.
I have raw talent, but that needs shaping if I want a career in ballet.
translation.zh:
‎我就像一块璞玉 要想在芭蕾界立足
‎就得接受雕琢

translation.en: And for that, the Archer School is the best place.
translation.zh: ‎在这方面 阿奇学院最有经验

translation.en: Well, thank you, Neveah. And good luck.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 娜薇娅 ‎祝你好运

translation.en: -[Monique] Thank you. -[reporter] Thank you.
You had a script.
I also had a life.
Why are you here slumming with the students?
-I figured if Ramon was coming-- -Smart.
-Keep an eye on him. -Hmm.
Ramon Costa, may I present my daughter Bette?
translation.zh:
‎罗蒙科斯特
‎请允许我向你介绍我女儿贝特

translation.en: ASB's next star graduate.
translation.zh: ‎阿奇学院的下一个明星毕业生

translation.en: He's already working with a graduate.
translation.zh: ‎他已经在跟一个毕业生合作了

translation.en: We're not potato chips, Delia.
translation.zh: ‎我们又不是薯片 迪莉娅

translation.en: -You can have more than one. -[phone beeps]
Mr. Costa, I hope you have a chance to watch me in class tomorrow.
translation.zh:
‎科斯塔先生 希望你有机会
‎去教室看我跳舞

translation.en: I'm not in the habit of viewing students.
translation.zh: ‎我没有去教室观察学生的习惯

translation.en: Too bad. You might be surprised.
translation.zh: ‎那太糟了 你或许会大吃一惊的

translation.en: -[camera shutter clicks] -[laughs] Thank you so much.
It's so good to see you. Thank you, Zandara.
translation.zh: ‎见到你太好了 ‎谢谢你 赞达拉

translation.en: -Just gotta say, huge fan. -You're very kind.
translation.zh: ‎我必须说我是你的铁粉 ‎你真是太客气了

translation.en: Neveah Stroyer. It's my first day here.
translation.zh: ‎我是娜薇娅斯托耶 第一天到学院

translation.en: Yes, I saw Monique parading you around.
translation.zh: ‎对 我看到莫妮卡带你四处展示了

translation.en: Yeah. I'm not sure I landed my jumps, you know what I mean?
translation.zh:
‎是 我不确定自己有没有成功
‎你懂我的意思吧？

translation.en: You kick high and smile, she'll love you.
translation.zh: ‎你昂首挺胸面带微笑 她就会爱你的

translation.en: This one wears your shoes.
My what?
Your pointe shoes.
Crams her little bunions into them like she's Cinderella.
translation.zh:
‎她把小拇囊硬塞到鞋里
‎好像自己是灰姑娘一样

translation.en: Actually, Cinderella's foot fits perfect--
Bette, have you been drinking?
-Did no one here get told fairy tales? -We were too busy living them.
translation.zh: ‎这里没人听过童话故事吗？ ‎我们忙着体验童话故事呢

translation.en: This isn't your world, little rat. Knowing the steps doesn't mean you belong.
translation.zh:
‎这里不是你的世界 小老鼠
‎能进来不代表你属于这里

translation.en: Well, someone here must think I do.
translation.zh: ‎这里肯定有人认为我属于这里

translation.en: -You don't get it, do you? -Bette, quit it.
translation.zh:
‎-你就是不明白 对吗？
‎-贝特 别说了

translation.en: The only reason Monique let you in
was to give the school a shiny, new distraction
translation.zh:
‎只是为了给学院
‎一个亮闪闪的新幌子

translation.en: after stupid Cassie bled out on the street.
translation.zh: ‎在笨蛋凯西躺在大街上流血不住后

translation.en: But you're even stupider. You can't see they're using you.
translation.zh: ‎但你比凯西更笨 ‎你都看不出来他们在利用你

translation.en: You'd just rather stand here star-fucking my sister.
translation.zh:
‎你宁愿站在这里
‎对我姐姐作出一脸痴迷相

translation.en: Sister?
Neveah, if you're here, you're good.
translation.zh: ‎娜薇娅 你能来这里 就说明你很优秀

translation.en: Nevie.
Just wanted to let you know I landed.
translation.zh: ‎我就是想让你知道我成功了

translation.en: You're doing that thing you do when you're trying not to cry.
translation.zh: ‎你又在耍那套努力抑制眼泪的花招

translation.en: -I don't have a thing I do. -Hell yeah, you do.
translation.zh:
‎-我没有什么花招
‎-你没有才怪

translation.en: You know, for a star dancer, your muscle control sucks.
translation.zh:
‎对一个明星舞者来说
‎你的肌肉控制能力糟透了

translation.en: And so does my situation here.
I need money. I'll pay you back, I promise.
translation.zh: ‎我需要钱 我会还你的 我保证

translation.en: -You're not coming home. -It's not working!
translation.zh:
‎-你不能回来
‎-我在这里待不下去！

translation.en: They got me playing some crazy-ass script that's not even me.
translation.zh:
‎他们让我按荒谬的剧本演戏
‎可那根本不是我

translation.en: You did it. You got out.
What for, Ty?
I came here to dance,
to do the one thing in my crazy-ass life that I can hold onto,
translation.zh:
‎是为了坚持自己糟糕的人生里
‎唯一能攥住的事

translation.en: and they don't care about that.
So what?
I don't fit in.
Well, halle-fucking-lujah!
What dancer wants to?
Nevie, you're never getting this chance again,
translation.zh: ‎娜薇 这种机会不会有下一次

translation.en: so you take everything you can from those freaks,
translation.zh: ‎所以你要把那些怪胎的东西都抢过来

translation.en: and when you're done, stratosphere.
translation.zh: ‎等你做到后 你就能一飞冲天了

translation.en: Stratosphere, baby.
[Nabil] Neveah.
Nabil, hey.
If you need someone else to say you are a good dancer…
translation.zh:
‎如果你需要别人
‎说你是个优秀的舞者…

translation.en: …you aren't.
But when you don't look like you jumped out of the music box--
-[Nabil] It's not how we look. -I see who these ballet companies hire,
translation.zh: ‎我们不是异类 ‎我看到那些芭蕾公司是怎么雇人的

translation.en: and most of the time, it's not us.
translation.zh: ‎大多数时候都不是我们这种人

translation.en: [Shane] Ow, fuck me!
-[grunts] -[Nabil] Hey, Shane.
-The party's over. -[Shane] Party is only starting, Nabil.
translation.zh:
‎-派对已经结束了
‎-派对才刚刚开始 纳比尔

translation.en: We're just warming up.
Now the old farts are tucking in, we're getting busy.
translation.zh:
‎现在那些老东西要睡觉去了
‎我们才要忙起来

translation.en: I heard what you were saying about not fitting the mold.
translation.zh: ‎我听到你说跟这里格格不入的话了

translation.en: That's a good thing, and it always has been.
translation.zh: ‎这是好事 而且向来都是

translation.en: So if you ever want proof that dancers like you have been around forever…
translation.zh:
‎所以如果你想要你这样的舞者
‎一直都存在的证据…

translation.en: …say the word. I'll show you some.
translation.zh: ‎跟我说一声 我会带你认识几个

translation.en: Go open the gate and let in the masses!
translation.zh: ‎去把门打开 放大家进来！

translation.en: June!
Hey. June Park, isn't it?
-Officer Cruz? -Yeah.
You're out late.
My mother's in town.
Oh, that's nice. Little support these days.
translation.zh: ‎不错 这种时候给你一点支持

translation.en: After all, you were Cassie's roommate, weren't you?
translation.zh: ‎毕竟你之前是凯西的室友 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
Must be hard for you, lying in your bed, staring at her empty one,
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-你一定很难过 ‎躺在床上盯着她的空床

translation.en: asking yourself, "What the hell happened?"
Isn't your investigation over?
translation.zh: ‎你的调查不是已经结束了吗？

translation.en: Officially, yeah, but I…
translation.zh: ‎严格来说结束了 没错 但我…

translation.en: I lost someone…
not that long ago, and I can't shake it.
translation.zh: ‎痛失所爱之人 我现在还没走出来

translation.en: Bet you can't either.
They all say she slipped.
You ask me, she jumped.
Then how'd she land on her back?
Maybe she wasn't interested in admiring the view on the way down.
translation.zh:
‎或许是因为她没兴趣
‎欣赏坠楼时的景色

translation.en: No history of depression, no note.
Who'd read it?
We all admired Cassie, but we didn't much like her.
translation.zh:
‎我们都很佩服凯西
‎但不怎么喜欢她这个人

translation.en: A raft of rivals.
-And this. -[cell phone beeps]
I took this on the roof today. See that? Those are scuff marks.
translation.zh: ‎我今天在房顶上拍的 看到没？ ‎这些是拖脚走路的痕迹

translation.en: Someone was backing away. They were trying to get free of something.
translation.zh: ‎当时有人在往后退 ‎我觉得他们是想摆脱掉什么

translation.en: Are-- are you saying Cassie was pushed?
translation.zh:
‎你的意思是
‎凯西是被推下去的？怎么…

translation.en: I'm not saying anything.
Look. I don't know a nutcracker from my nightstick,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我分不清坚果钳和夜勤警棍

translation.en: but I know danger when I see it.
Folks at your school might keep getting hurt unless we shine a light.
translation.zh:
‎我们要是不查下去
‎学院里可能还会有人受伤

translation.en: Here's my card.
There's rules, officer.
And I'm not the one around here to break them.
[Cassie] All day, someone else controls what you eat,
translation.zh: ‎一天到晚都有人控制你的饮食

translation.en: what you wear, how you move, and who you touch.
You're strapped into the roller coaster with your fiercest competitors.
translation.zh:
‎你和你那些凶猛无比的竞争者
‎被绑在一辆过山车上

translation.en: But what nobody else sees
is those rivals are also the only people who get you…
translation.zh: ‎那些对手也是唯一懂你的人…

translation.en: who celebrate you for who you are and challenge you to do better.
translation.zh:
‎他们接受原本的你
‎而且挑战你做到更好

translation.en: There's no other way to say it.
translation.zh: ‎这种关系只能用一种方式形容

translation.en: They're your tribe.
Hey. You know I don't go there.
Except I kind of do.
We're just helping each other out here.
I know, not like this means anything.
How'd you get your V-cut like that?
How about we use our anatomy, not talk about it?
translation.zh: ‎还是好好用它 别多说了吧

translation.en: Seriously, though… what's your secret?
translation.zh: ‎但我是认真的…你的秘诀是什么？

translation.en: Don't know, I just dance.
I worked all summer on my external obliques
translation.zh: ‎我整个夏天都在练腹外斜肌

translation.en: trying to carve out a set,
and I can't get your results.
-Lucky me. -Hmm.
If you go to the gym, I should-- Oh, my God.
translation.zh: ‎如果你去健身房 那我应该…老天

translation.en: I didn't see you.
Nobody does.
[Neveah] Delia.
Dropping off the trash, all for you.
translation.zh: ‎我把不穿的鞋丢过来 都是给你的

translation.en: How do I know if I'm the right fit?
You just keep your neck long,
your hips small,
your arches high.
[June] And bone.
-They want to see bone. -[bones cracking]
June, stop!
-[whimpering] -You need help!
Help!
-[gasps] -[Delia] The only way out is up.
[Neveah] Mom! Mom!
Mom! Mom!
Mom!
[panting] Cassie.
You should never have come.
No!
Pathetic.
You're shit.
Here to steal my secrets?
No, thanks. I got my own.
translation.zh: ‎不了 谢谢 我自己有秘诀

translation.en: Bet you do.
[Neveah] You're thinking about it too much.
Trying to show how hard you're working, like that gets you points or something?
translation.zh:
‎想表示出你有多努力
‎就好像这能让你得高分一样？

translation.en: Except nobody wants to see you sweat.
I've had the country's top teacher--
And look where that got you.
You know you want to say something, so just say it.
Oh, no, I wouldn't want to mess you up.
translation.zh: ‎算了 我还是别干扰你了

translation.en: Please.
What I do is I think of my hips turning on an axis.
translation.zh:
‎我会想着自己的臀部
‎在绕着一根轴线转

translation.en: So when you go to start your turn…
…you stay in the plié longer.
That way you're halfway into your turn before you're up.
translation.zh: ‎这样的话你起身时 已经转了半圈了

translation.en: So it's a cheat?
Call it a dance hack.
Good, but stay in the plié longer.
Now you're dancing like a Whitlaw.
translation.zh: ‎现在你跳得有点惠特劳尔的样子了

translation.en: That was supposed to be a compliment, Miss Thing.
translation.zh: ‎这话其实是赞美 自大小姐

translation.en: Know what it's like having a sister who just made principal dancer?
translation.zh:
‎你知道有个刚成为主演的姐姐
‎是什么感觉吗？

translation.en: Everybody thinks that's why you got accepted here.
translation.zh: ‎所有人都觉得你是因此才被录取的

translation.en: Exactly.
I think it was your parents' money that got you in.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你是靠父母的钱进来的

translation.en: Which is why at crack of dawn…
I'm here.
♪ It's all up in the air now ♪
♪ Oh, let me go ♪ [vocalizing] ♪ Don't ♪
[Topher] Partnering. It is about working together,
but it's also about…
opposition.
About finding a language of reach and response.
translation.zh: ‎在于找到沟通和回应的语言

translation.en: A partner doesn't have to be a friend.
Nureyev was 20 years younger than Fonteyn.
Hallberg and Osipova, they did not even speak the same language.
translation.zh:
‎霍尔伯格和奥希波娃
‎都不说同一种语言

translation.en: But through the dance, you will find a bond,
translation.zh: ‎但通过芭蕾 你们会找到连结

translation.en: or you will die trying.
Sarah, you will dance with Kirill.
Gwen, you'll dance with Josh.
Lily, you'll be with Evgeni.
translation.zh: ‎莉莉 你跟叶夫根尼结对

translation.en: -Emily with Lucas. Esmé with Caleb. -[students murmuring]
translation.zh:
‎-艾米丽和卢卡斯
‎-太好了！ ‎埃斯梅和凯勒布

translation.en: Neveah with Oren.
June, you'll dance with Nabil,
and, Bette, you will be with Shane.
Wait, I'm with Nabil? [gasps]
translation.zh: ‎等一下 我跟纳比尔搭档？

translation.en: -Hey, Nabil. -Mr. Brooks, aren't I paired with Nabil?
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 纳比尔
‎-布鲁克斯先生 不是我跟纳比尔吗？

translation.en: Ballet is ever-changing, Miss Whitlaw.
translation.zh: ‎芭蕾一直是变动的 惠特劳尔小姐

translation.en: I just think I'm better off with him.
translation.zh: ‎我只是觉得我跟他搭档更好

translation.en: He's taller, je parle français, and he's, you know, my level.
translation.zh:
‎他个子更高 我也会说法语
‎而且 你知道的 我们是同一水平

translation.en: Shane is a fine dancer, quite capable of partnering you. Or…
translation.zh:
‎肖恩是不错的舞者
‎有足够的能力跟你搭档 或者…

translation.en: do you question me?
Of course not.
Thank you, sir.
Try to contain your enthusiasm.
You better fucking dance.
-[classical music playing] -[Topher] Let us begin. And that's right.
Piqué into fifth.
translation.zh: ‎吸腿转 以五位站姿收住

translation.en: Tombé straight from that attitude, no hesitation.
translation.zh: ‎直接从鹤立姿落下 不要犹豫

translation.en: -Turn out those petit battements, ladies. -[phone vibrates]
-Everything okay? -Just a message from an old friend.
translation.zh: ‎没事吧？ ‎就是一个老朋友发来的短信

translation.en: [Topher] No one needs to see that transition en face!
Nabil, nice elevation on that lift.
translation.zh: ‎纳比尔 抬高的那个动作不错

translation.en: Evgeni, get her further over her leg.
translation.zh: ‎叶夫根尼 让她的腿伸得更远

translation.en: Bette, no, it's straight into passé relevé.
translation.zh: ‎贝特 不对 直接转入单脚立

translation.en: There's no extra pas de bourrée. Stop cheating.
translation.zh: ‎没有多余的插秧步 别再走捷径

translation.en: Hold my hips, not my waist.
translation.zh: ‎把手放在我的臀部 不是我的腰部

translation.en: The transition from the pirouette into the attitude is late.
You need to get the leg out and lift under the thigh.
translation.zh: ‎你得把腿伸出来 然后在大腿下抬起

translation.en: Well, I can't if he won't put me on my leg.
translation.zh: ‎他不把我的腿托起来 我也没办法

translation.en: That's not the problem. You need to spot faster,
translation.zh: ‎这不是问题 ‎你得更快辨别 预测到阿拉贝斯

translation.en: anticipate the arabesque, and get over your box.
translation.zh: ‎你得更快辨别 预测到阿拉贝斯 ‎然后把鞋尖伸过去

translation.en: -But if Shane-- -[Topher] Enough! I didn't correct Shane.
translation.zh:
‎-但如果肖恩…
‎-够了！ ‎我指正的不是肖恩

translation.en: I corrected you, again.
Show me the pirouette.
No, that's not working.
Let's try another section.
I can't look at this anymore.
Take it from the corner into the jetées.
translation.zh: ‎回到那个角落 开始小踢腿

translation.en: -[classical music playing] -Come on, girl, you got this.
translation.zh: ‎加油 妞儿 你可以的

translation.en: [Topher] Shane, faster hands. Bette, find your center.
translation.zh:
‎肖恩 手部动作快点
‎贝特 找到你的重心

translation.en: Close your ribs and up, up, go up!
-[grunts] -[gasps] Lordy fuck, are you okay?
-[Bette] I'm fine. -Are you sure?
-[music stops] -Yes.
Yeah.
Let's do it again.
I'll spare you.
If you don't properly prepare for a lift, it will never work.
translation.zh:
‎要是没做好上举的准备
‎怎么都不行的

translation.en: If your timing isn't in sync,
you need to find a way to save it, to adapt.
translation.zh: ‎就得想办法去补救 去适应

translation.en: Has anyone been paying attention?
We have.
Well, all right, then. Show me the second half.
We can go now.
More extension on that cambré.
Thank you.
We'll continue tomorrow.
[Ramon] Tomorrow's spoken for.
Tomorrow we begin auditions.
The rep this term is no longer The Sleeping Beauty.
translation.zh:
‎这学期的展示作品
‎不再是《睡美人》了

translation.en: Tomorrow, I work on a new ballet.
translation.zh: ‎明天我会开始创作一部新的芭蕾剧

translation.en: No Sleeping Beauty?
That little bitch.
We'll create a ballet of passion and darkness on the edge of desire.
translation.zh:
‎我们会创作一部行走在欲望边缘
‎充满激情和黑暗的芭蕾新剧

translation.en: We tell the story…
of Jack the Ripper.
The sex maniac who killed those women, like, a hundred years ago?
translation.zh:
‎那个100年前
‎杀死很多女人的性变态？

translation.en: We'll find something more appropriate.
translation.zh: ‎我们会找一个更合适的主题

translation.en: What could be better?
We live in a dark, twisted world full of loss, lies, and brutality.
translation.zh:
‎我们生活在一个黑暗扭曲的世界
‎这世界充满失去、谎言和残忍

translation.en: Monique DuBois…
you have your ballet.
Auditions tomorrow. Go.
You know we have our favorites.
And so do I.
-June. -You were right.
I can't stop thinking about Cassie.
The thing is, she wasn't alone on the roof.
translation.zh: ‎问题是 当时在屋顶上的不止她一人

translation.en: And Madame DuBois knows it.
There was a secret party with every tier-three student but me.
translation.zh:
‎所有三阶的学生都去开秘密派对了
‎除了我

translation.en: I was in my room where I was supposed to be.
translation.zh: ‎我就在房间里 那是我该在的地方

translation.en: They all told me they were tucked in. If you see or hear anything--
translation.zh: ‎他们跟我说他们都睡了 ‎如果你看到或听到什么…

translation.en: There won't be.
I won't be here much longer.
Got you some ice.
Don't need it.
[scoffs] Just chill.
Literally.
You were right.
Good. Feels better?
I mean about us dancing together this year.
My parents could pull some strings.
No, you were right.
It's better we don't mix dance and our relationship.
translation.zh: ‎我们还是不要把跳舞和恋爱搅在一起

translation.en: Because you had one good pas de deux and some easy choreography?
translation.zh:
‎因为你有个会跳简单编舞的
‎优秀双人舞舞伴？

translation.en: It wasn't easy for you.
[Bette] It would be if we were partners.
translation.zh: ‎我们要是搭档的话 我就能跳好

translation.en: Shane doesn't know how to handle me.
Bette.
And plus, you know she's the reason I fell.
translation.zh: ‎而且 你知道我摔倒都是她的错

translation.en: She was pushing me this morning, making me do too much.
translation.zh: ‎她今早激我 让我练了太久

translation.en: Right. It was Neveah's fault or Shane's or Brooks'.
translation.zh:
‎对 都是娜薇娅 或者肖恩
‎或者布鲁克斯的错

translation.en: But you were the one who fell, Bette.
Petit rat.
[Cassie] When you make that leap, you fly alone.
translation.zh: ‎你纵身一跃 开始独自飞翔

translation.en: It can help if there are others onstage with you,
translation.zh:
‎如果台上有其他人陪着你
‎你会觉得安心

translation.en: that corps de ballet.
I'm sorry.
[Cassie] They're the company's lowest, the corps.
translation.zh: ‎他们处在舞团的最底层 群舞演员

translation.en: [June sobbing] I'm so sorry.
[Cassie] The hungriest, most vulnerable.
Cassie.
I'm sorry.
[Cassie] Only there's power in that hunger.
translation.zh: ‎只是他们的饥渴里蕴含着力量

translation.en: It drives you to take crazy risks,
translation.zh: ‎这股力量驱使你下最荒谬的赌注

translation.en: to do what it takes to stand out from the crowd.
You risk too much,
fly too high…
-[screams] -…and you could end up like me, in this bed,
translation.zh: ‎就会落得我这样的下场 躺在床上

translation.en: clinging to life.
[Cassie] In the corps, your job is to fit in,
translation.zh: ‎身为群舞演员 你的职责是融入进去

translation.en: to be an invisible part of a larger body while others claim the spotlight.
translation.zh:
‎在聚光灯打到别人身上时
‎成为一个更大的集体里的一个隐形人

translation.en: In French, "corps" means "body,"
translation.zh:
‎在法语里
‎“群舞演员”是“身体”的意思

translation.en: or what you might call a corpse.
What all of us are fighting not to become.
translation.zh: ‎我们所有人努力避免的下场

translation.en: It's that last turn nobody wants to make when you die…
translation.zh: ‎没有人想要走上这条黄泉路

translation.en: or when enough people see you that way.
♪ All the stars ♪ ♪ All the stars that come at night Don't compare ♪
♪ It's hanging on the wall While you're stumbling, stumbling ♪ ♪ Stumbling, stumbling ♪
